concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Java:Type:EJB) RETURN type as EJB ORDER BY type.fqn

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.ejb.Stateless with "EJB" and "Stateless".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Stateless" SET t:EJB:Stateless RETURN t AS EJB

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.ejb.Stateful with "EJB" and "Stateful".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Stateful" SET t:EJB:Stateful RETURN t AS EJB

concept.description: Labels all classes annotated with @javax.ejb.Singleton with "EJB" and "Singleton".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Singleton" SET t:EJB:Singleton RETURN t AS EJB

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.ejb.MessageDriven with "EJB" and "MessageDriven".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.MessageDriven" SET t:EJB:MessageDriven RETURN t AS EJB

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.ejb.Local with "Local".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Local" SET t:Local RETURN t AS LocalBean

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.ejb.Remote with "Remote".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Remote" SET t:Remote RETURN t AS RemoteBean

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated with @javax.ejb.Schedule with "Schedule".
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Schedule" SET m:Schedule RETURN m AS ScheduledMethod

constraint.description: Check that Schedule methods are only delared in EJB classes.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (c:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method:Schedule) WHERE NOT c:EJB RETURN c.fqn AS invalidBean, m.name AS scheduledMethodName

constraint.description: Stateful Session Beans should be avoided.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type:EJB:Stateful) RETURN type AS `Stateful Session Bean`
